  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83483</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83483</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces on a rescue helicopter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte auf einem Rettung Hubschrauber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces sur un hélicoptère de délivrance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças em um helicóptero do salvamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze su un elicottero di salvataggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις σε ένα ελικόπτερο διάσωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas en un helicóptero del rescate</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the forces acting on a rescue helicopter that should be kept still are the uplift force of rotor and the weight of helicopter and rescue cage.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equal forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rescue cage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rescue helicopters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rotors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uplift forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß die Kräfte, die auf 
einem Rettung Hubschrauber fungieren, der noch gehalten werden sollte,
die Erhebungkraft des Rotors und das Gewicht des Hubschraubers sind 
und Rahmen retten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les forces agissant sur 
un hélicoptère de délivrance qui devrait encore être gardé sont 
la force de soulèvement du rotor et le poids de l'hélicoptère et 
sauvent le camp.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as forças que agem em 
um helicóptero do salvamento que deva ser mantido ainda estão a 
força do uplift do rotor e a um peso do helicóptero e salvam a 
gaiola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che le forze che si 
comportano su un elicottero di salvataggio che dovrebbe essere 
mantenuto ancora sono la forza del uplift del rotore ed il peso 
dell'elicottero e salvano la gabbia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι οι δυνάμεις που 
ενεργούν σε ένα ελικόπτερο διάσωσης που πρέπει να κρατηθεί 
ακόμα είναι η δύναμη ανόδου του στροφέα και το βάρος του 
ελικοπτέρου και του κλουβιού διάσωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las fuerzas que actúan 
en un helicóptero del rescate que deba todavía ser guardado son la 
fuerza del levantamiento del rotor y el peso del helicóptero y 
rescatan la jaula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gleiche Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rettung Rahmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rettung Hubschrauber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rotoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhebungkräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">camp de délivrance</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
